name: Hover Cabby
description:
Made for Cyperpunk Game Jam 2.0. I have wanted to do a game about being a hover cab driver for ages so when this jam finally came around I decided to give it a shot!

To be honest it's more of a driving from checkpoint to checkpoint at the moment- But the car feels quite nice to fly around in! I recommend you play with a controller
developers: Alexander Birke aka Out Of Bounds Games
